text: 18.19: 1 Sml 4.12; Ese 27.30-34Mbe maaŋ suaŋgiap, vherɨna ndigip, wari wo pani ga purpurgi. Mbe anan wari wo pani ga purpurgiap, ana kora mbuav wari nziav, nanaman suirav guigira ndavi simgiap wari ki. Mbe kav kaav, khaŋ nzuai, ‘Khue! Khue, bigɨna mbatɨga guareŋra mbu ŋgu bakɨmen hɨgi! Kha ŋkee bakɨvi namŋga, mbe kha ŋkee ga ruav, mbasɨgi rɨgar shɨga mbuav, mbe mbu ŋgu bakɨme ŋkɨɨar panan, mbe guigira ŋkɨɨa vhɨrve ki gumgi ki. Ana aua bavira, ana za mbatɨgi!’
